title: Trick or Treat lulu skin concept

embed.description: Had a lot of fun working on this piece Trick or Treat Lulu Splash Art

body:
Here is a skin concept i worked on a while ago with some VFX, i had a lot of fun with this one!
Here is the VFX! 
https://pre00.deviantart.net/0c06/th/pre/i/2017/292/a/8/trick_or_treat_lulu_vfx_abilities_by_hamzilla15-dbr1jt9.jpg
Here is the splash!
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/BGOEm

For more you can follow me on
Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/Hamzilla15-542006589222736/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel
im also on patreon so support me for as little as $1!
https://www.patreon.com/Hamzilla

thanks!! i hope you like it
